      • getOrientation

        public int getOrientation()
        For the orientation they are only available two position. Orientation is either | or _. It is assumed that current atom is of type EDGE.
        Specified by:
        getOrientation in class AbstractGrowthAtom
        Returns:
        horizontal (0) or vertical (1).

        public byte getNewType(int addToNeighbour)
